data.name: Seeds of Chaos
data.detailed_description:
You May Also Like

https://store.steampowered.com/app/885510/Smutty_Scrolls/?curator_clanid=35401591


About the Game



Not your average visual novel, Seeds of Chaos is a sexy dark fantasy tale with RPG & Strategy elements. Become an active participant in the story, making choices which impact your experience and shape the direction of the narrative in meaningful ways.

Seeds of Chaos aims to deliver a player driven experience inspired by influential CRPG titles of years gone by.





Jam packed with over 15 hours of playtime and diverse game systems, Seeds of Chaos has more than enough content to keep you ensnared for days on end.

  • Reactive Storytelling- branching which makes each playthrough feel personal & rewarding!

  • Indulge In Your Desires- debauchery awaits with over 100 unlockable sex scenes!

  • Customize Your Domain- flex your planning skills with our castle management system!

  • Explore A Rich Fantasy World- explore a map filled with discoveries and adventure!



Follow the story of Rowan Blackwell, a hero responsible for saving his land from the clutches of a demon lord, as he finds himself forced to serve the dark bidding of a new, nefarious evil.

Descend into darkness and join our hero on a journey of corruption and betrayal. Will you be able to change the course of history and maintain your heroic spirit, or will you live to become the undoing of everything you once fought for?

Fight against the hands of fate or give in to the darkness, the choice is yours.



Seeds of Chaos is the first part of a planned trilogy. If you complete this game, your unique progress and storyline will carry over to the next part of the story.

data.short_description: Not your average visual novel, Seeds of Chaos is a sexy dark fantasy tale with RPG & Strategy elements. Become an active participant in the story, making choices which impact your experience and shape the direction of the narrative.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

movies.name: Seeds of Chaos Early Access Trailer

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is dark fantasy and contains depictions of frequent sexual interactions between humans and a variety of fantasy creatures such as orcs and demons. The content in this game includes but is not limited to-

- Cuckoldry/NTR (Cheating)
- BDSM
- Femdom
- Group Sex
- Gay & Lesbian
- Impregnation
- Sexual Violence
- Dubious Consent
- Suicide

Those of you who are faint of heart have been warned.
